snippet.title: Puzzle Bobble VS (2003) - Nokia N-Gage Gameplay
snippet.description:
Puzzle Bobble VS is an enduring classic. A deceptively simple puzzle game, you must blast the bubbles on your side of the screen by matching colors, then fire bubbles at your opponent’s screen. Bluetooth wireless technology brings up to four-player multi-play action, and a unique Avec mode allows two people to play against each other on one game deck. Super-addictive puzzle action.
